title: Victorious skins
body: Hi, I was just wondering if victorious skins were available through hextech crafting? I'm one of those rare people who really love to play maokai and enjoy him so much! But I am sadly not skilled enough to earn Victorious Maokai by reaching Gold+. So yeah thanks for reading! :)

replies.body:
Victorious skins are currently exclusive to season rewards, and not available through hextech.  You still have some time left, don't give up!  See if you can queue up with a few friends to help, and get you there.  Keep at it!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=txWWi2n76FI
Ok thanks! I love your icon by the way! Also when does the season end?
Thanks! :D  The 2016 season ends on November 7, per our [guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon).  Good luck!
